def.dt: :including many, most, or all things a comprehensive list comprehensive insurance [=insurance that covers all kinds of risks] a comprehensive [=thorough] course of study
:of or relating to a comprehensive school comprehensive education

utxt.vi: Each patient was comprehensively [=completely, thoroughly] evaluated.
Trade was comprehensively regulated by the authorities.

def.dt: :a school in Britain for children of all different levels of ability who are over the age of 11 Some of his friends attended the local comprehensive school.
